section.heading: Commission may prescribe changes in form of schedule.
section.text: The Commission may prescribe such changes in the form in which the schedules are issued by any public utility as may be found to be expedient.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 109 of the Child Support and Welfare Reform Compliance Emergency Amendment Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-446, November 7, 2000, 47 DCR 9213).

For temporary (90-day) addition of § 43-530.1 1981 Ed., see § 109 of the Child Support and Welfare Reform Compliance Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-241, January 11, 2000, 47 DCR 581).
